intro.resumoDesc1: I am Rick Reis, a developer and audiovisual creator, with experience in software and visual projects, presented here in separate areas.
intro.resumoDescDev1: With experience in professional, academic, and personal projects, my technical skills include HTML/CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Vue.js, Node.js, PHP/Laravel, and SQL. I use agile methodologies, such as Scrum and Kanban, to organize tasks and demands in Azure DevOps.
intro.resumoDescDev2: Throughout my professional journey, I contribute to the maintenance and evolution of systems that serve a large number of people, directly impacting the services provided. I highlight my ability to solve problems, learn quickly, and work as part of a team. I value quality and strive to balance it with deadlines, ensuring the best possible results.
intro.resumoDescAudiovisual1: I have experience in video editing, creating motion graphics, vignettes, and visual elements using tools like Premiere, Photoshop, Figma and Cinema 4D, applying creativity and technique to transform ideas into engaging content.

about.sobreDesc: I consider myself a problem-solver and a fast learner who is constantly seeking to improve.
about.sobreDesc2: With advanced English and degree in Systems Analysis and Development, I have accumulated knowledge and experience in development, with solid skills in React, HTML/CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, Sass, Node.js and SQL, along with relevant knowledge in PHP, Docker, REST API, Flutter, Bootstrap, and other technologies.
about.sobreDescAudiovisual1: I am a creative person, with the ability to learn quickly and constantly seeking to improve my skills.
about.sobreDescAudiovisual2: I have experience in video editing, creating motion graphics, vignettes, and visual elements using tools like Premiere, Photoshop, Figma, HitFilm Express, and Cinema 4D, applying technique and creativity to develop engaging content.

insany.title: Jr. Front End Developer
insany.description: I develop interfaces based on UI and UX designs, ensuring fidelity to approved visuals and behaviors with a pixel-perfect standard. I work on projects across different industries, collaborating with designers and developers to deliver consistent user experiences. I primarily use React and Figma, occasionally working with Webflow and WordPress, and also handle maintenance and improvements of existing code to support project evolution and efficiency.

fairy.title: Jr. Full Stack Developer
fairy.description: With a focus on frontend, I worked on diverse projects with different business rules, using generative AI tools and intelligent IDEs like Cursor on a daily basis to optimize development. I contribute with solutions focused on user experience, system integration, and interface architecture in a dynamic and innovative environment.

conecta.title: Jr Full Stack Developer
conecta.description: I contributed to the maintenance and evolution of systems used by hundreds of internal users and external clients, helping to sustain and improve processes that directly impacted the company's operational activities and the quality of the services provided. I used PHP/Laravel, Vue.js, MySQL, and log analysis for troubleshooting, combining these with the Scrum methodology and tools like Azure DevOps and Git, along with AI tools to achieve the best possible results.

fatec.title: Web Developer Intern
fatec.description: Working with React, Node.js, SCSS, Figma, Auth0, and Notion, I contributed to both Back-end and Front-end development and participated in planning an initial system base version for a service portal aimed at centralizing requests related to the college's coordination.

rickReis.title: Video Editor & Content Creator
rickReis.description: I Produced videos on curiosities, vlogs, and animations, applying narrative, rhythm, and dynamic cuts. Created intros, vignettes, and motion graphics elements for different channel segments. Developed complete visual identity packages, including call-to-action and end screens. Published content that reached over 620 thousand views, maintaining aesthetic and creative consistency.

personalProjects.title: Video Editor & Content Creator
personalProjects.description: Modeled and animated objects in Cinema 4D, creating motion graphics and animations for personal videos, academic projects, and collaborations. Integrated visual effects into YouTube edits, exploring narrative and music synchronization. Recreated TV vignettes with attention to movement, color, and rhythm details. Produced fictional commercials and motion design experiments to consolidate visual style. Developed visual identities inspired by professional productions, applying editing and animation techniques.
